title: Slow-Cooked Potato Chowder
directions: Combine From the Farm™ Thick Cut potatoes, onions, broth, and cream in slow cooker.
Cover and cook on low 8-10 hours or until potatoes are tender.
Top with bacon, Parmesan and chives before serving.
ingredients: 1 package From the Farm™ Thick Cut potatoes
⅝ cup 35% cream (cream of chicken soup can be substituted)
⅜ cup softened cream cheese, cubed
½ cup bacon, cooked and crumbled
